purge.invalidAmount:
Please provide a valid amount of message(s) to purge.
Expected a number between 1 and 100.
Got: **{AMOUNT}**.
purge.error: An error occurred while trying to purge message(s).

ban.invalidUser:
Please provide a valid user to ban.
Expected a mention or a user ID.
Got: **{USER}**.

success.title: User Banned
success.dm: You have been banned from **{GUILD}**. Reason: {REASON}

ban.highestRole: You cannot ban **{USER}** because they have a higher role than you.
ban.unableToBanOwner: I am unable to ban the server owner.
ban.error: An error occurred while trying to ban **{USER}**.

kick.unableToKickOwner: I am unable to kick the server owner.
